articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Message from Leader of Malian Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Message from Leader of Malian Political Party
Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message from Tiemoko Sangare, chairman of the African Party for the Solidarity and Justice of Mali, on Dec. 7.
					 The message says:
					
					 I pay the noblest tribute to you on behalf of all members of the African Party for the Solidarity and Justice and on my own behalf on the occasion of the 6th anniversary of the demise of HE Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the great leader of the Korean people.
					
					 The WPK could register great success in the struggle for building a powerful socialist country under the wise leadership of HE Kim Jong Il.
					
					 His great immortal feats will always be in the hearts of the world progressives century after century.
					
					 I affirm that the African Party for the Solidarity and Justice will invariably support your struggle for safeguarding the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of the nation and availing myself of this opportunity, I sincerely wish you happiness in good health and greater success in your responsible work for building a powerful socialist country and the peace and security of the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Congratulations to FM of Sierra Leone
articles.content:
Congratulations to FM of Sierra Leone
Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Ri Yong Ho, DPRK foreign minister, on Dec. 16 sent a congratulatory message to Kaifala Marah upon his appointment as minister of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation of Sierra Leone.
					 The message wished the minister success in his work, expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop in the mutual interests.

articles.title: Indian Embassy Officials Visit KPA Military Museum
articles.content:
Indian Embassy Officials Visit KPA Military Museum
Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Officials of the Indian Embassy here Tuesday visited the Korean People's Army Museum of Weapons and Equipment.
					 The guests went round various kinds of weapons and combat equipment which show the muscle of the KPA.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Leaves
Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Japanese Women's Society for the Study of the Juche Idea to learn from Kim Jong Suk led by Yoko Hayashi, member of the Shizuoka Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, left here for home on Tuesday.

articles.title: Participants in 5th Conference of WPK Cell Chairpersons Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Participants in 5th Conference of WPK Cell Chairpersons Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 5th Conference of Cell Chairpersons of the Workers' Party of Korea paid homage to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Dec. 19.
					 They paid homage before the statues of the great leaders.
					
					 They made deep bows to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il at the halls where they lie in state.
					
					 They went round rooms where orders the great leaders received are on display and halls that house cars, motor car, boat and train coaches used by them for their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: DPRK Women Footballers Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Women Footballers Back Home
Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The DPRK women footballers returned home on Tuesday after winning the title of the 2017 EAFF E-1 Football Championship.
					 They defeated the teams of China, south Korea and Japan in the championship held in Japan on Dec. 8-16 and thus won the third straight championships along with victories in the championships in 2013 and 2015.
					
					 Kim Yun Mi of the DPRK was awarded the best player and top scorer and Kim Nam Hui the top defender and Kim Myong Sun the top goalkeeper in the championship.
					
					 The DPRK players and their coaches were greeted at Pyongyang International Airport by Choe Hwi, vice-chairman of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea who is chairman of the National Sports Guidance Committee, Ri Ryong Nam, vice-premier of the Cabinet who is chairman of the DPRK Football Association, and Kim Il Guk, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, and officials concerned.
					
					 Sportspersons and families warmly congratulated the players and coaches with garlands and flowers.
					
					 The players and their coaches visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill and laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statues before paying tribute to the great leaders.

articles.title: 33rd Sci-Tech Festival of Kim Il Sung University Opens
articles.content:
33rd Sci-Tech Festival of Kim Il Sung University Opens
Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The 33rd Sci-Tech Festival of Kim Il Sung University opened with due ceremony on Tuesday.
					 The festival, divided into ten panels including basic science, elements and devices, electronics and automation, agriculture and bio-engineering and medicine, will involve presentation and exhibition of sci-tech successes, exhibition contest among different units and exchange of new technologies.
					
					 Presented to the festival were over 310 scientific research achievements.

articles.title: Protection of Disabled Further Improved in DPRK
articles.content:
Protection of Disabled Further Improved in DPRK
Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Korean Federation for the Protection of the Disabled has made achievements in rehabilitating the disabled and providing them with stable living conditions and environments this year. 
					 The federation organized a training course and symposium for members of the non-permanent state committee for the protection of the disabled to develop their sense of responsibility and role and share achievements and experience.
					
					 The non-permanent committee for the consultation of Korean sign language examined and reviewed 3 600 historical terms, sign words and descriptive vocabularies and completed the sign language program and sign language DVD presentation for the education of the deaf and dumb.
					
					 The federation offered necessary facilities to work-teams of the disabled in Sinuiju, Hamhung and Wonsan areas.
					
					 It has undertaken such mobile services as repairing prosthetic apparatuses and supplied wheelchairs, walking sticks, glasses and others to more than 1 600 persons with disabilities. And it sent ophthalmologic instruments and medical supplies to provincial people's hospitals.
					
					 It equipped the Korean Rehabilitation Centre for Children with Disability and the centre for early education in sign language with hearing-test rooms for infants, apparatuses for the recovery of cerebral palsy and equipment for the education of sign language, and sent hearing aids to people with hypacusia.
					
					 It has also published textbooks for the blind, operated a library for the disabled at the Sci-Tech Complex on a normal basis and entered people with disabilities in tele-education colleges.
					
					 The federation has encouraged a number of disabled persons to take active part in art and sports activities.
					
					 The Korean Art Association of the Disabled created 20-odd musical pieces and presented 6 musical instruments and craftworks to the 9th Pyongyang Musical Instruments Exhibition to be highly appraised.
					
					 The performance of a Pyongyang exchange group of disabled persons in a foreign country and art performance given on the occasion of the day of persons with disabilities aroused great sensation. 
					
					 The Korean Federation for the Protection of the Disabled has paid deep attention to increasing the number of sports events for the disabled and training promising sportspersons with disabilities.
					
					 It has compiled and brought out over 5 000 publications like 2017 annual report and properly run internet homepage "Huimang (Hope)" to raise the public interest in protecting the disabled.
					
					 Amid the active exchange and cooperation between international bodies, national associations and overseas Koreans' organizations related with the protection of the disabled, more than 30 delegations visited the facilities for the protection of the disabled.
					
					 In particular, a close cooperation between the federation and the European Union Programme Support to the DPRK has been made in different fields like special education and disaster prevention and the UN special rapporteur on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities and her party showed a disposition to render technological cooperation in executing the accord on the rights of the disabled.

articles.title: Achievements Made in Educational Work
articles.content:
Achievements Made in Educational Work
Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Many achievements have been made in the educational field of the DPRK this year marking the 40th anniversary of the publication of President Kim Il Sung's work "Theses on Socialist Education".
					 General education system was put on a higher basis with the opening of over 100 technical senior middle schools.
					
					 In keeping with the enforcement of universal 12-year compulsory education, a nationwide training course was given to improve the qualification of teachers and most of schools across the country came to have multi-functional classrooms getting access to the state-run network.
					
					 A simultaneous test for evaluating students' ability with justice was applied in some regions this year and, on this basis, preparations have been intensified to enforce the simultaneous test in Pyongyang and several counties of each province next year.
					
					 And parks for children to educate them in traffic regulations were built in different parts of the country.
					
					 As part of the efforts to perfect the educational system in the field of higher education, the college of forest science came into being at Kim Il Sung University with its opening ceremony held in April.
					
					 Pyongyang University of Printing was promoted to Pyongyang University of Publishing and Printing and over 30 special schools were turned into vocational ones.
					
					 Sectional universities are pushing ahead with the academic integration on a high level through the state-run network, thus making it possible to improve the overall university education.
					
					 With the start of distance education in at least 20 subjects, universities are striving to put the distance education on a higher stage.
					
					 Kim Il Sung University improved the teaching of political and ideological subjects by adhering to the policy of the Workers' Party of Korea and encouraging theoretical explanation in plain language and generalized it throughout the country. It also gains momentum at all universities to put education on a practical, comprehensive, modern and IT basis.
					
					 Meanwhile, big efforts have been directed to creating and introducing effective and superior educational methods.
					
					 The international symposium held at Kim Il Sung University, the 3rd National Education and Science Seminar, the 18th national software exhibition of educational institutions and other seminars and exhibitions served as occasions to promote the education, scientific research and sci-tech exchange.

articles.title: Japanese Police Search Business groups of Chongryon
articles.content:
Japanese Police Search Business groups of Chongryon
Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries are getting hell-bent on the suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 On December 17 the Police Agency of Japan conducted a forcible search of the Kumgang Insurance Company, a business group under Chongryon.
					
					 It forcibly searched the head office of the company, its 11 branch offices across Japan and 13 persons' houses including the director, vice-director, chief and employee in coordinated operation with police headquarters of Tokyo Metropolis, Nishi Tokyo and other prefectures.
					
					 This action was taken on the groundless charge that "fund was whisked away from the bank account of the company for concealment."
					
					 It is said that such reckless action is the first time since the formation of Chongryon.
					
					 The criminal nature of the recent forcible search finds expression in the fact that Japanese media massively spread rumor against Chongryon by releasing an article entitled "The Police Agency searches an enterprise under Chongryon" as soon as the police's action started.
					
					 Earlier on December 14, a joint investigation team formed with policemen of Kyoto Prefecture and four other prefectures conducted a forcible search of the office of the Football Association of Koreans in Japan at the Korean Commercial Workers Hall, claiming that they investigate the Japanese company "Emu Create's" violation of the "law on foreign exchange".
					
					 Meanwhile, the team searched the house of the former chairman of the Shibuse, Tokyo Metropolis, branch of Chongryon on the same pretext.
					
					 Such rude action of the Japanese reactionaries is another grave provocation and heinous crime against the DPRK and Chongryon.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary on U.S. Talk about "Use of Non-lethal Weapons" against DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary on U.S. Talk about "Use of Non-lethal Weapons" against DPRK
Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- U.S. media recently spread a story about the development of microwave weapons targeted on the rockets of the DPRK.
					 NBC News and CNN reported that the White House discussed the use of microwave weapon on trial in order to neutralize the nuclear weaponry of the DPRK in August last.
					
					 With regard to this, a spokesman for the U.S. Air Force Institute stressed that if a war with the DPRK breaks out, such weapon will paralyze the electronic circuits of its rockets and prevent them from firing and that such action will never require any blitz nor cause casualties on the part of the enemy side.
					
					 The keynote of the above-said claim is that the U.S. can destroy the DPRK's ICBMs capable of striking the whole U.S. territory in their launching bases and it is to ignite a "humanitarian war" by use of non-lethal weapons.
					
					 Its noisy talk about "war" is not surprising as Trump once cried out for totally destroying the DPRK. But it is something which cannot be overlooked that it has put up the card of non-lethal weapon use all of a sudden.
					
					 Now Americans are getting vocal in their opposition to the use of force against the DPRK with their increasing fear and uneasiness of being exposed to the attack by its nuclear forces which have put the whole U.S. territory in their strike range.
					
					 This troubles the Trump administration and war maniacs of the U.S. military who are pining hope on the use of force, obsessed with megalomania.
					
					 Against this backdrop, they raised the issue of non-lethal weapon development to calm down the anti-war sentiments of the public at home and abroad and to justify their scenario for igniting a war against the DPRK.
					
					 It is just red herring to cover up their bloody imperialist acts of war against humanity and civilization.
					
					 On Nov. 30 the U.S. Department of Defense issued a statement that it would lift the ban on the use of cluster bomb internationally recognized as WMD, asserting it is "badly needed for maintaining strong military muscle" and remains a "safe weapon."
					
					 A cluster bomb sends out smaller bombs when it explodes to cause mass destruction. Its use is banned by an international treaty.
					
					 The above-said decision betrays the true colors of the U.S. which is touting a "humanitarian war without victims on the part of the enemy side."
					
					 In the final analysis, the U.S. talk about "use of non-lethal weapon" is just sophism to create public impression that the second Korean war, a global thermonuclear war, will be safe and thus secure a justification for provoking the war.
					
					 The U.S., employing all sorts of trickery to provoke a fresh war, is just the wrecker of global peace and security. 
					
					 The U.S. moves once again prove the necessity and justice of the DPRK's measures for bolstering its war deterrent.
					
					 The international community should heighten their vigilance against the U.S. sinister moves to plunge the world into a crucible of war.

articles.title: DPRK Will Never Flinch from Road of Bolstering Nuclear Force: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Will Never Flinch from Road of Bolstering Nuclear Force: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- U.S. Secretary of State Tillerson said at a forum co-sponsored by the U.S. Atlantic Council and international exchange foundation on Dec. 12 that the U.S. could be open to peace talks with the DPRK without preconditions. We are only going to talk if the DPRK comes to the table ready to give up its program, and the DPRK needs to earn its way back to the discussion table by refraining from further military provocations, he added.
					 Commenting on the fact, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says that what the U.S. seeks in proposing talks with or without preconditions is the nuclear dismantlement of the DPRK and there is nothing changed.
					
					 The DPRK has no interest in the dialogue intermittently put up by the U.S. which is sneered by the international community for failing to mind its internal affairs, the commentary says, adding:
					
					 As the DPRK has consistently insisted, the way to solve the issue between the DPRK and the U.S. is for the U.S. to drop at an early date its heinous hostile policy, which defines the DPRK as an enemy, and co-exist peacefully with the DPRK possessed of nukes.
					
					 As long as the U.S. hostile policy and nuclear threat toward the DPRK are not fundamentally removed, the DPRK will never put its nukes and ballistic missiles on the table of negotiations nor flinch even an inch from the already chosen road of bolstering up the nuclear force. This is the fixed stand of the DPRK.

articles.title: Another War Drill Conducted in S. Korea
articles.content:
Another War Drill Conducted in S. Korea
Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialist aggression forces and south Korean military warmongers staged another combined drill "Warrior Strike" for destroying strategic military targets of the DPRK in U.S. military bases in Uijongbu, Kyonggi Province and other places from Dec. 12 to 15, according to the south Korean Newsis.
					 On the last day of the drill the commander of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces in south Korea and the chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff of the south Korean forces went round the field of the drill to fan up war fever.
					
					 They conducted similar drill in September last.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Release Prisoners of Conscience
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Release Prisoners of Conscience
Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The committee for promoting the release of prisoners of conscience and organizations of citizens and students in south Korea held a rally outside Chongwadae on Dec. 16 to demand the release of prisoners of conscience, according to the south Korean online paper Voice of People.
					 At the rally speakers said that the present chief executive should make a bold decision on the release, adding that they won't stop their struggle until all the prisoners of conscience arrested during the period of the preceding regime are released.

articles.title: S. Korea: Jongyojo Urges Authorities to Remove Evils in Education
articles.content:
S. Korea: Jongyojo Urges Authorities to Remove Evils in Education
Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The Teachers Union of south Korea (Jongyojo) held a meeting in Seoul on Dec. 15 to urge the authorities to remove the evils in education, according to the south Korean Newsis.
					 At the meeting with more than 2 000 teachers involved, the speakers urged the "government" to withdraw the measure to outlaw the union and abrogate the system of estimating teachers and wage system based on piece rate.
					
					 They denounced the authorities for evading the liquidation of evils in the education, demanding the establishment of a new educational system to ensure the rights of educational workers.

articles.title: Juche Idea Study Organization Formed in Russia
articles.content:
Juche Idea Study Organization Formed in Russia
Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The Branch of the Republic of Altay of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea was formed.
					 Dariya Valentsinovna Kadkina was elected the chairperson of the branch.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in DR Congo
Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo on Dec. 6 posted on its website the full text of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" on the occasion of the 6th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il and the 26th anniversary of his assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army, the 6th anniversary of Kim Jong Un's assumption of the KPA supreme commandership and the 100th birth anniversary of the anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 The work, published on April 15, Juche 101 (2012), says that the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proves the immutable truth that an outstanding leader assures the dignity and prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					 It sets forth the tasks for glorifying the dignity of Juche Korea for all ages and successfully realizing the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Germany
Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany on Dec. 6 posted on its website the full text of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "On Improving the Role of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea in Accomplishing the Juche-Oriented Socialist Cause" to mark the first anniversary of its publication.
					 The work, published on Dec. 6, Juche 105 (2016), clarifies that the UAWK is a mass political organization of the Korean socialist agricultural workers, founded and developed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, and a reliable transmission belt and peripheral organization of the Party.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks facing the union.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk's Career Lauded Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk's Career Lauded Abroad
Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Political parties and organizations of Colombia and Brazil posted special write-ups interwoven with photos and paintings of the anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk on their websites in the run-up to her 100th birth anniversary.
					 The Communist Party of Colombia on Dec. 1 posted an article saying that Kim Jong Suk, a prominent woman revolutionary produced by the Korean nation, is a woman commander who took part in the protracted armed struggle against the Japanese imperialists. The article elaborated on her rare military strategy, incredible marksmanship, matchless pluck and warm humanity.
					
					 The Brazilian Center for the Study of Songun Politics on Nov. 25 posted detailed data to show that Kim Jong Suk protected the safety of President Kim Il Sung at the risk of her life during the anti-Japanese war. It said:
					
					 Kim Jong Suk had worked as a bodyguard of the President till the last moments of her life.
					
					 Her stance as a bodyguard remained unchanged in the periods of the anti-Japanese war and the building of a new country after the country's liberation.
					
					 This year the Korean people greet the centenary of her birth.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk's noble career as the anti-Japanese war heroine and woman guerrilla commander will be kept in the minds of the Korean people and the world progressives forever.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje del presidente de partido de Mali
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje del presidente de partido de Mali
Pyongyang, 19 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Jong Un, recibio un mensaje que le enviara el dia 7 el presidente del Partido Africano por la Solidaridad y Justicia de Mali, Tiemoko Sangare.
					La misiva senala:
					
					Su Excelencia
					
					Con motivo del VI aniversario de fallecimiento de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del PTC y gran Dirigente del pueblo coreano, le expreso a Vd. mi mas alta consideracion en nombre de todos los militantes del Partido Africano por la Solidaridad y Justicia de Mali y en el mio propio.
					
					Gracias a la sabia direccion de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il, el PTC pudo alcanzar grandes exitos en la construccion de una potencia socialista.
					
					Sus imperecederas proezas estaran siempre presentes en el corazon de los pueblos progresistas del mundo pese al transcurso del siglo.
					
					Afirmando que el Partido Africano por la Solidaridad y Justicia de Mali apoyara invariablemente su lucha por defender la soberania del pais y la dignidad de la nacion, deseo sinceramente en esta oportunidad que Su Excelencia tenga buena salud y felicidad y obtenga mayores exitos en sus trabajos responsables para la construccion de potencia socialista y la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Le reitero el testimonio de mi mas alta consideracion.

articles.title: Llegan a Pyongyang las futbolistas coreanas
articles.content:
Llegan a Pyongyang las futbolistas coreanas
Pyongyang, 19 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Arribaron el dia 19 a esta capital las futbolistas coreanas, quienes ganaron en el Campeonato E-1 de la Federacion de las Asociaciones de Futbol del Este de Asia de 2017, que tuvo lugar del dia 8 hasta el 16 en Japon.
					En esta cita deportiva el once coreano gano la copa y la medalla de oro, tras vencer a sus rivales chino, surcoreano y japones, y registro las 3 victorias sucesivas (la primera en 2013 y la segunda en 2015).
					
					 El conclave otorgo a Kim Yun Mi los premios de mejor jugadora y goleadora del campeonato; a Kim Nam Hui, el de mejor defensa; a Kim Myong Sun, el de mejor portera.
					
					En el Aeropuerto Internacional de Pyongyang Choe Hwi, vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Comite Estatal de Direccion de Deportes, Ri Ryong Nam, presidente de la Asociacion de Futbol de la RPDC y vicepremier, Kim Il Guk, ministro de Deportes, y otros funcionarios de las ramas interesadas acogieron a las futbolistas y entrenadores.
					
					Los deportistas y los familiares felicitaron con collares y ramos de flores a las jugadoras y entrenadores.
					
					Las jugadoras y entrenadores subieron a la colina Mansu donde rindieron homenaje a los grandes Lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, tras depositar un cesto y ramos de flores al pie de sus estatuas de bronce.

articles.title: Se eleva en Corea la calidad de proteccion a los discapacitados
articles.content:
Se eleva en Corea la calidad de proteccion a los discapacitados
Pyongyang, 19 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Este ano, el Comite Central de la Federacion de Proteccion a Discapacitados de Corea logro muchos exitos en sus trabajos para rehabilitar a los discapacitados y facilitarles las condiciones de vida estable.
					Exigio trabajar con mas responsabilidad y desempeno a los miembros del comite no permanente del Estado para la proteccion a discapacitados y les instruyo intercambiar los exitos y experiencias mediante el cursillo de trabajo y el seminario.
					
					Otro comite no permanente de evaluacion del lenguaje coreano de signos completo el programa y el DVD que se usaran en las Escuelas de Sordomudos.
					
					Se mejoran las condiciones del trabajo por aficion en los equipos de produccion de los discapacitados en las ciudades de Sinuiju, Hamhung y Wonsan.
					
					La federacion organizo los servicios de reparacion de los aparatos ortopedicos para mas de 1600 personas con discapacidades y les suministro los aparatos auxiliares como el sillon de ruedas, baston y espejuelos.
					
					Igualmente, quedaron enviados los aparatos de oftalmologia y articulos medicos a los hospitales populares provinciales.
					
					El Centro de Recuperacion de Ninos Discapacitados de Corea y otros tambien recibieron los aparatos medicos.
					
					Acabo de editar nuevos manuales para los alumnos ciegos y garantiza la operacion normal de la sala de lectura para los discapacitados del Palacio de Ciencias y Tecnicas y el ingreso de ellos a la Universidad de Tele-educacion.
					
					De otro lado, la Asociacion Artistica de los Discapacitados de Corea creo mas de 20 obras nuevas como la musica instrumental nacional Ryonggangginari, la musica ligera "Pyongyang es la mejor" y otras y presento en la IX Exhibicion de Instrumentos Musicales de Pyongyang 6 instrumentos musicales y productos artesanales hechos por los discapacitados.
					
					Causaron grandes repercusiones las funciones en el extranjero del grupo de intercambio de los discapacitados de Pyongyang y otras dedicadas al dia de ellos.
					
					Se aumentan las disciplinas deportivas para ellos y se forman los prometedores jugadores de reservas.
					
					Tomo auge la propaganda mediante el anuario de 2017, la pagina Web "Huimang" y la edicion de mas de 5000 publicaciones.
					
					Como parte de amplio intercambio y cooperacion entre las organizaciones internacionales y las asociaciones nacionales vinculadas con la proteccion a discapacitados y las entidades de coreanos residentes en ultramar, mas de 30 delegaciones visitaron los establecimientos de proteccion a los discapacitados.
					
					En particular, se pusieron en practica los proyectos de cooperacion estrecha con la Representacion de Cooperacion de la Union Europea en Corea en varias esferas como educacion especial y prevencion de desastres.
					
					Ademas, la relatora especial para los derechos de los discapacitados adscrita al Consejo de Derechos Humanos de la ONU y su comitiva expresaron la voluntad de ofrecer la cooperacion tecnica en el cumplimiento de la convencion de los derechos de las personas con discapacidades.

articles.title: Policia japonesa registra a fuerza las empresas de Chongryon
articles.content:
Policia japonesa registra a fuerza las empresas de Chongryon
Pyongyang, 19 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Los reaccionarios japoneses se ponen freneticos para oprimir la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon (Chongryon).
					El dia 17, la Prefectura de Policia de Japon registro coercitivamente la Compania Limitada del Seguro Kumgang de la Chongryon.
					
					Con la incorporacion de los centros locales inclusive la metropoli de Tokio, la policia japonesa registro a fuerza la sede y 11 oficinas locales de esta compania y las casas de 13 empleados inclusive el director, subdirector y jefes de oficinas locales.
					
					Las autoridades policiacas japonesas perpetraron la violencia bajo la sospecha irrazonable de que "la compania oculto el deposito de la cuenta administrada por ella".
					
					Esclarecio en la orden de pesquisa no los objetivos individuales, sino las expresiones de que "es ambiguo el sospechoso", para amplificar el ambito de investigacion por toda la compania.
					
					Hasta la actualidad, los reaccionarios japoneses cometieron el registro forzoso contra la Chongryon bajo los pretextos injustos, pero es primera vez despues de la fundacion de la Chongryon la simultanea pesquisa forzada como ahora contra la oficina principal y las locales y hasta las residencias del director y empleados.
					
					Inmediatamente despues de iniciada la operacion de la policia, los medios de prensa japoneses transmitieron sucesivamente las noticias intituladas "Prefectura de Policia registra la empresa de Chongryon con la sospecha de impedimento de ejecucion compulsiva" y circularon ampliamente la opinion publica anti-Chongryon, he aqui el caracter criminal de la pesquisa forzada.
					
					Con anterioridad, la direccion de pesquisa conjunta, compuesta por las policias de Kyoto y los Departamentos de Kanagawa, Yamaguchi, Shimane y Niigata, registro la oficina de la asociacion de futbol de coreanos residentes en Japon situada en el interior de la casa de comerciantes coreanos con el pretexto de investigacion a la violacion de la "ley de cambio de divisas" de una compania japonesa.
					
					Mas de 10 investigadores desarrollaron el registro de la oficina por varias horas, pero no obtuvieron ningun indicio del crimen.
					
					Por otra parte, la direccion de pesquisa conjunta registro a fuerza, con el mismo pretexto, la casa del ex presidente de un filial de la metropoli de Tokio de la Chongryon.
					
					Esta violacion barbara de los reaccionarios japoneses deviene gran provocacion y crimen contra la RPDC y la Chongryon.
